WorkItem.Description: Both are only available for Ele spec not for resto. When i switch spec i can choose them from the list but not when i have resto spec. Professions are set right. They show up correctly in the loaded char items but are not available to choose in the enchants list (while springy arachnowave is) when i want them for optimizer.
WorkItem.Summary: [RestoSham] Lightweave Embroidery and Hyperspeed Accelerators Missing

Comments.Message: I'll need to know which version you are using as well as a posting of your character file so I can make sure to reproduce what you are seeing.
